page.title: 05LIFE IN KINTON, NESSCLIFFE
page.content: Kinton is very quiet there are only a few children. I spend most of my time watching the tractors and the irrigator. Alot of helicopters fly over our house and land on the army training camp and sometimes you can see men running about with their guns.My Mum takes me to Nesscliffe school each day by car. My sister will go to school at Baschurch next year by bus - the only one that goes through Kinton. The library van comes every 2 weeks. My friends come from Nesscliffe on their bikes to play at my house. We play Swoop and Flak on the computer, they are dodging games. Sometimes we play on our bikes in the lane. I have to go to Nesscliffe to buy sweets or go to the Naffi shop on the army camp. I wouldn't like to live anywhere else.
